question: When were the Sassi of Matera recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site?
asked_question_translated: Wanneer werden de Sassi van Matera erkend als UNESCO Werelderfgoed?
answer: De Sassi van Matera werden erkend als UNESCO Werelderfgoed in 1993.
answer_translated_eng: The Sassi of Matera were recognised as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1993.
